articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Autographic Letter
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Autographic Letter 
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent an autographic letter to the employees of the Bioengineering Branch of the State Academy of Sciences in reply to their letter, which was presented to him on January 26. The autographic letter reads "Kim Jong Il, February 9, 2011"
					 The employees in their letter thanked him for lavishing praise on them and showing deep loving care for them. 
					
					 They vowed to work heart and soul and run higher and faster in the van of the drive for pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology to attain the high goal, the desire of President Kim Il Sung and the ideal of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK Minister of Foreign Trade Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Minister of Foreign Trade Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade of the DPRK, and his party left here Saturday to visit Russia.

articles.title: Finnish Party Delegation Winds up Its Visit to DPRK
articles.content:
Finnish Party Delegation Winds up Its Visit to DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Finnish Communists' League led by Chairman Kalevi Wahrman returned home on Saturday after visiting the DPRK.
					 During its stay in the DPRK, the delegation visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, the Tower of the Juche Idea, the e-library of Kim Il Sung University, the venue of the 15th Kimjongilia Festival, the Korean Revolution Museum, etc.

articles.title: National Photo Exhibition Draws Large Crowd of Visitors
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Draws Large Crowd of Visitors 
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The national photo exhibition now under way at the People's Palace of Culture here is drawing a large crowd of visitors every day. It opened on February 10 in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il
					 On display there are hundreds of photos including those on his history of immortal revolutionary leadership.
					
					 "The Birthplace of Kim Jong Il in the Secret Camp in Mt. Paektu, the Time-honored Holy Place of the Sun", "The Platform of the Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea", "The Firework Gala Celebrating the 65th Anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea" and other photos deal with the honor and joy of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK having him at the top posts of the party, the state and the army. 
					
					 Visitors pause for a long while before photos including "The Respected Supreme Commander Comrade Kim Jong Il Inspecting the Training of Soldiers of the People's Army", "The Respected Supreme Commander Comrade Kim Jong Il Giving Field Guidance to the Taedonggang Eel Breeding Farm of a Unit of the Korean People's Army", "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Giving Field Guidance to the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex." 
					
					 Jo Song Hyok, official of the Taesong District People's Committee of Pyongyang, 37, said when interviewed by KCNA:
					
					 "The photos on display here help me deeply grasp once again the immortal revolutionary exploits Kim Jong Il has performed by leading the cause of building a thriving socialist nation along the road of victory. 
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the army and people of the DPRK as they are led by Kim Jong Il, the great man born in Mt. Paektu, who is bringing about the prosperity of the country."

articles.title: Kimjongilia Festival Draws Endless Crowd of Visitors
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Festival Draws Endless Crowd of Visitors
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The 15th Kimjongilia Festival is drawing an endless crowd of visitors every day. It opened here on Feb. 14.
					 Tens of thousands of potted Kimjongilias, the immortal flower, are on display in the venue of the festival, presenting fantastic scenery. It has been visited by at least 250,000 persons so far. 
					
					There have been 15 Kimjongilia festivals since the first one that opened here in Feb. 1997. More than 200,000 potted Kimjongilias have been on display, drawing millions of Koreans and foreigners from different countries of the world. 
					
					 South Koreans, overseas Koreans and people of various strata of the world have made sincere contributions to the festival, adding significance to it as a festival common to mankind, a world festival. 
					
					 Prominent personages, friendship organizations of many countries and international organizations contributed potted Kimjongilias to the festival every year. Dozens of foreign organizations are taking part in the on-going festival.

articles.title: Venue of Kimjongilia Festival Crowded with Visitors
articles.content:
Venue of Kimjongilia Festival Crowded with Visitors 
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition in Pyongyang, the venue of the 15th Kimjongilia Festival, is crowded with visitors every day. 
					More than 100,000 people visited there on Feb. 16 alone.
					
					 Kimjongilias in full bloom turned the venue of the festival into a veritable sea of flowers. 
					
					 Visitors were excited to go round the undying flowers reflecting the profound reverence of the Korean people and the revolutionary people of the world for leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Jong Jong Hwan, 44, official of the General Bureau for Service for People, had this to say: Looking round the venue of the festival I was deeply touched to learn that soldiers and people of the country so successfully cultivated Kimjongilias despite unprecedented cold this winter.
					
					 Han Yong Sik, 51, official of the Ministry of Metal Industry, said that it is not easy to make a flower come into blossom earlier than its season. The people who make the immortal flowers bloom with deep trust in their leader can hardly be found in any other part of the world, he added.
					
					 Yun Un Byol, 21, worker under the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said those flowers in praise of the great man are the crystal reflecting the ardent desire of all the Korean people for the wellbeing and good health of Kim Jong Il, the maker of a new history of the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Art Performance of Workers Given
articles.content:
Art Performance of Workers Given
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Art squads of employees at the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex and the February 8 Vinalon Complex of the DPRK gave their premiere at the People's Palace of Culture here on Friday. 
					 The numbers included "Whistle of Hungnam", "Push Back the Frontiers of Latest Science and Technology" and "The Road of Victory".
					
					 Appreciating the performance were officials of ministries and national institutions in the city of Pyongyang and working people.

articles.title: Exhibition of Old Lamp Devices Opens
articles.content:
Exhibition of Old Lamp Devices Opens
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of old lamp devices opened at the Korean Folklore Museum on Feb. 3.
					 Displayed are more than 100 pieces that were used by the Koreans from the remote ages to the modern times. The exhibits are divided into three categories: lamp, candle and garden lantern.
					
					 Typical lamps include bronze lamp-oil container dating to Ancient Korea, stone lamp stand dating to the period of Koguryo, stone and gem lamp-oil containers belonging to the period of Koryo and tree and brass lamps belonging to the period of the Ri Dynasty.
					
					 Candles include iron candle stand dating to the period of Ancient Korea, stone candle stand to the period of Koguryo and bamboo knot candle stand to the period of the Ri Dynasty.
					
					 Drawing particular attention of the visitors is a white indoor candle stand depicting a legendary animal that is believed to fight fire.
					
					 Also exhibited are more than 48 garden lanterns of 22 kinds including those depicting lotus watermelon, crane, fish, garlic and turtle shell.
					
					 There are also photos of a stone lantern and gilt-bronze crystal-studded candle stand dating to the period of Palhae.
					
					 All lamp devices showcase the excellent handcraft skill of the Korean nation that has pursued practicality, artistry and decoration from the ancient times.
					
					 The exhibition is slated to last till August.

articles.title: Preparations for Taekwon-Do Championships Brisk
articles.content:
Preparations for Taekwon-Do Championships Brisk
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The preparations for the 17th World Taekwon-Do Championships are brisk in the capital city of Pyongyang of the DPRK, birthplace of Taekwon-Do.
					 The organizing committee is busy carrying out diverse plans for successful championships due in September.
					
					 The project of building the sacred place of Taekwon-Do, Korean martial art, is going full steam ahead. It would showcase the undying leadership feats by the peerlessly great persons for the development of Taekwon-Do, the kinds of the Korean nation's martial art and its development as well as the history of the International Taekwon-Do Federation.
					
					 The Taekwon-Do Hall, a venue of the championships, is undergoing successful renovation.
					
					 Already produced was the design of championship logo depicting the DPRK flag, the Taekwon-Do Hall and Taekwon-Do movement. Also completed were designs of gold, silver and bronze cups and technical prize.
					
					 The Taekwon-Do players of the DPRK are training themselves for the championships.
					
					 Pyongyang sponsored the 8th World Taekwon-Do Championships in 1992.

articles.title: 50th Birthday of Academy of Koryo Medicine Marked
articles.content:
50th Birthday of Academy of Koryo Medicine Marked
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- It has been 50 years since the Academy of Koryo Medicine was founded in the DPRK.
					 In this period the academy has made signal contributions to the development of the nation's medicine and the promotion of the people's health.
					
					 Its researchers and medical workers solved the scientific and technological problems arising in Koryo therapy (traditional treatment) of incurable diseases and authored scientific papers and various kinds of reference books.
					
					 More than 700 reference books including "Koryo Clinical Dictionary" and "Koryo Medicine Comprehensive Dictionary" have been released.
					
					 The academy contributed to the treatment and health recovery of citizens by scientifically applying Koryo medicines, acupuncture, moxibustion, cupping, massage therapy, etc. to suit their symptoms and physical constitution while properly combining modern medicine with traditional medicine.
					
					 It also turns out dozens of kinds of reserve medicines, including Ryongsinhwan and cordial made with bezoar, popular medicines and tonics greatly helpful to the prophylactic treatment.
					
					 It has produced over 300 holders of academic degrees or titles and presented hundreds of inventions.
					
					 Meanwhile, the academy has conducted brisk scientific exchange with other countries, thus making successes in the development of the traditional Korean medicine.

articles.title: Antarthritic Developed
articles.content:
Antarthritic Developed 
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Recently the Radiotherapeutic Institute of the Academy of Medical Science in the DPRK developed Yttrium Micro Sphes.
					 The injection containing about 5-20 micrometer micro spheres is good for various arthritis including rheumatism.
					
					 Its working realm is limited to 3 millimeters. So it influences the infected area only, not hurting any other region.
					
					 Unlike the existing medicines there is no need to use this injection for a long time. Just one or two injections are enough to get full recovery.
					
					 The institute made clinical tests of the injection at health institutions in the city, while establishing scientific methods of using it.

articles.title: Restaurants in Pyongyang Serve Foreign Dishes
articles.content:
Restaurants in Pyongyang Serve Foreign Dishes
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Restaurants in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, serve dishes of different countries as well as traditional Korean dishes.
					 The specialist restaurant under the Okryu Restaurant serves not only dishes cooked with sturgeon, turtle, bullfrog and salmon but also spaghetti and other foreign dishes.
					
					 Changgwang street of a chain of restaurants is crowed with visitors hoping to taste wheat vermicelli and other Chinese dishes and Western food.
					
					 Such Chinese dishes can be taken at the Hyangmanru Popular Restaurant and Chongchun and Ryonmot restaurants, too.
					
					 In Kwangbok Street there is an Italian specialist restaurant whose dishes of various kinds of pizza and spaghetti are popular among customers.
					
					 Cookers of those restaurants are acclaimed by customers for their admirable cookery.

articles.title: Exploration of Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu Brisk
articles.content:
Exploration of Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu Brisk
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- A comprehensive exploration of Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu of the DPRK is now making brisk headway.
					 The members of the Group for the Comprehensive Exploration of the Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu are intensifying the observation and survey of the lake despite the extremely unfavorable natural environment in order to clarify the mystery of the lake which attracts people's attention for its magnificent, graceful and fascinating scenery.
					
					 According to the observation data available, diastrophism in the area of the lake and the state of ice there at present remain just the same as those last year and animals' activities are normal.
					
					 The hot spring of Mt. Paektu preserves the same property in midwinter, having a striking contrast to the thick ice covered with snow.
					
					The minimum temperature at present was observed 1°C lower than last year, the wind speed on Janggun Peak registered 40m/s and thickness of the ice was over 1 meter. It is getting thicker.
					
					 There were distinct footprints of animals living on the shore of the lake including squirrel and striped squirrel and squeaking of piping hare, a rare animal there, is heard frequently.
					
					 Rhododendron looks green despite bitter cold in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 It is fantastic to see the sunrise on Mt. Paektu, snow storms that fill its valleys in a minute, snow-covered vast lake, mountains covered with ice of various shapes and frostworks near the hot spring, etc.

articles.title: Literature and Arts Give Spurs to Onward March for Great Surge
articles.content:
Literature and Arts Give Spurs to Onward March for Great Surge
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The literature and arts in the DPRK are creditably playing their role as a pacemaker powerfully encouraging all the service persons and the people in their onward march for a great surge. 
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il clearly indicated the general orientation and ways for the development of the literature and arts in the new century, leading officials, creators and artistes in these fields to create masterpieces one after another.
					
					 "October Concert" given by the Unhasu Orchestra and the performances by the Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe and other art troupes last year on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea were highly acclaimed by people as they reflected Kim Jong Il's far-reaching idea with rich ideological contents and high artistry.
					
					 The audiences were mesmerized by such songs as "Push Back the Frontiers of Latest Science and Technology", "Higher and Faster" and "Let Us Meet at the Front." They could be produced thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The State Theatrical Troupe started its local performance tour with the light comedy "An Echo among the Hills" in Haeju City of South Hwanghae Province. It set a record in its period, the number of the performances given and audiences, making a hot wind of echo among the hills sweep the whole country. 
					
					 In the meantime, the mass-based arts reflecting the fixed faith and revolutionary optimism of the working class in the DPRK were created as a model of a new culture in the era of Songun on the basis of the revolutionary soldier culture.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the literature and arts in the DPRK are rich in the ideological content and high in artistry and characterized by simplicity and popular character. They are powerfully encouraging the broad masses in their drive for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Will Left by Japanese Botanist
articles.content:
Will Left by Japanese Botanist
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- "The flower named after Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, who would steer the new century, will spread to the whole earth in the near future".
					 This is the prophecy made by Snao Oohiro, who was representative member of the Kimjongilia Society in Japan.
					
					 He was fascinated by the noble virtues of leader Kim Jong Il while visiting the DPRK several times as an adherent to the Juche idea. He dedicated himself to spreading this flower among Japanese.
					
					 He let his members know about what world people said of the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il and conducted positive activities to help broad masses join the above-said society.
					
					 He gave publicity to Kimjongilia in various forms and methods and conducted brisk activities to distribute books on the biological character of the flower and methods of its cultivation.
					
					 He, his heart burning with the profound reverence for Kim Jong Il, asked his members to continue spreading Kimjongilia and publishing its bulletin before breathing his last.
					
					 Kimjongilia is widely cultivated not only in Japan but in various other countries.
					
					 The period since the appearance of an international body for propagating Kimjongilia with the formation of the Nordic Kimjongilia Association in Sweden in 1995 witnessed the inauguration of Kimjongilia greenhouses in many countries including China and Indonesia and the creation of a series of organizations for propagating it and supporters' bodies.

articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Blocking Improved North-South Relations
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Blocking Improved North-South Relations
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are standing in the way of improving the north-south relations while denying dialogue. This is quite contrary to the trend of the times and the desire of all the Koreans, as it reveals their policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun, major newspaper of the DPRK, says this in a bylined article Saturday.
					
					 Their confrontation policy is very dangerous as it harasses peace and increases the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula. This anti-reunification policy also blocks north-south dialogue and negotiations and obstructs their improved relations, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The confrontation policy rendered the situation on the peninsula so tense that a war may break out any moment. It also stoked distrust and misunderstanding between fellow countrymen, making it impossible for them to trust and get reconciled. It is also a main factor of chilling the atmosphere of dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 It is impossible to create the atmosphere of trust and reconciliation between the north and the south nor is it possible to hold successful dialogue for repairing the relations as long as the south Korea authorities pursue the hostile policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 They had better make an immediate switchover in their policy, paying heed to the voices of all the Koreans for peace and reunification of the peninsula.
					
					 The whole Korean nation is closely following their attitude.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work was marked by a bylined article of Rodong Sinmun Saturday.
					 In his work on February 19, Juche 63 (1974) Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as the integrated Juche system of idea, theory and method. He also declared it as the supreme program of the Workers' Party of Korea to model the whole society on the Juche idea. 
					
					 The article says: 
					
					 The declaration of the supreme program made the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung a great guiding idea in the era of independence and provided the Korean revolution with a powerful weapon for dynamically advancing despite difficulties. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il has wisely led the cause of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea to victory. This is proved by the fact that he trained all the soldiers and people to be Juche-type revolutionary fighters in the Songun era, consolidated the single-minded unity of the party and the revolutionary ranks and applied the demand of the Juche idea to all the fields of the revolution and construction. 
					
					 All the soldiers and people of the DPRK have now grown stronger in idea and faith, armed with the great Juche idea and Songun idea. They have strong mental power with steadfast faith to remain true to the Juche idea in any storm and stress. 
					
					 The solidity and invincibility of the single-minded unity in the DPRK are guaranteed by the firm center of the idea and leadership. They are steadily developing on the basis of the greatness of the leader. All the soldiers and people of the DPRK enshrine the slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by the great Comrade Kim Jong Il!" as their faith. And the great army-people unity in thinking and work-style is demonstrating its might. This is the true picture of Songun Korea. 
					
					 Thanks to the belief of Kim Jong Il in Juche, the self-reliant national defence capacity of the DPRK has remarkably increased and Korean-style and Juche-style has been fully applied to all the fabrics of social life. In particular, self-supporting economy is becoming stronger day by day in the flame of the grand march for great surge to build an economic power. This is the brilliant fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who regards the Juche idea as a treasured sword for invincibility.

articles.title: S. Korean Court Sentences Reunification Champions to Prison Term
articles.content:
S. Korean Court Sentences Reunification Champions to Prison Term 
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The puppet supreme court recently sentenced Kang Jin Gu to prison term, according to CBS of south Korea. He is the chairman of the Organization Development Committee of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration.
					 The court confirmed the original judgment which sentenced him to prison term on charges that "he formed an organization sympathizing with the system of the north and staged pro-north activities." 
					
					 It also sentenced three other core members of the organization to penal servitude according to the original decisions.

articles.title: Articles Praising Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Posted
articles.content:
Articles Praising Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Posted 
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Articles praising President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il were posted on Internet homepages of south Korea, according to its media on Feb. 16. 
					 Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century" and other articles splashed on the homepages under various names. 
					
					 They carried articles "It is honor of the Korean nation to have you, son of Mt. Paektu. We wish you good health till the day when sun over Mt. Paektu would shine this land" and "Happy New Year Juche 100 to Kim Jong Il" under the title "Celebration of February 16". It also carried a photo of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They also carried an article titled "The rationale for the DPRK to become a thriving nation" and another article calling on the south Korean authorities to immediately respond to the DPRK's proposal for the south-north dialogue.

articles.title: "Arirang" Selected as Most Beautiful Melody in World
articles.content:
"Arirang" Selected as Most Beautiful Melody in World
 Beijing, February 19 (KCNA) -- Korea's "Arirang" was selected as the most beautiful melody in the world.
					 Composers of the U.K., the U.S., France, Germany and Italy recently held a meeting to select the most beautiful melody in the world and made this decision by the overwhelming approval rate of 82 percent.
					
					 Conveying this story, the Chinese "Heilongjiang Sinmun" (Internet) said on Feb. 18 that this cannot but be an astonishing result, taking into consideration the fact that there was no Korean among the members of the jury.
					
					 "Arirang", a symbolic and typical folk song of the Korean nation, is not only a song which has been loved and widely sung by it since olden times but a song which was sung in chorus like the national anthem when players of the north and the south entered the stadium as a unified team, confirming it is a homogeneous nation at present when the Korean Peninsula remains divided into two, it stressed.

articles.title: US Measure for Cuba Prompted by Sinister Intention
articles.content:
US Measure for Cuba Prompted by Sinister Intention 
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The United States decided to ease restrictions on Cuba tourism and remittance.
					 U.S. students and religious organizations are reportedly allowed to visit Cuba.
					
					 U.S. airports will start services of flights bound for Cuba, some of them having already done.
					
					 The United States describes the measure as a product of the effort for improvement of relations with Cuba and as a thing for the Cuban people.
					
					 But it is the public opinion that the measure is a hypocritical one.
					
					 The United States applies the measure only to students and religious organizations armed with the view of American-style "liberty" and "democracy". 
					
					 What is worse, Cuban governmental officials or Communist Party members can not be remittees. 
					
					 News analysts are of the view that the U.S. measure is a psychological operation for giving rise to mistrust and disunion in Cuba.
					
					 If the United States truly wants to see improved ties with Cuba and do something favorable for the Cuban people, it should not apply limitation to the measure.
					
					 It is unreasonable for the United States to talk about "easing" and "improvement of relations", while failing to implement the UN resolution calling for lifting the anti-Cuba blockade.
					
					 The United States should not play a poor trick but fundamentally revise the anachronistic Cuba policy.

articles.title: US Diplomats Fear for Terrorism
articles.content:
US Diplomats Fear for Terrorism 
						

					Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- U.S. diplomats abroad have reportedly considered wearing bulletproof vests.
					Not only U.S. troops but also diplomats have become targets of revenge in countries where the U.S. launched a war on terrorism.
					
					Some time ago, a staff member of the U.S. consulate in Pakistan was shot on a roadway.
					
					It was another tragedy caused by the U.S. "anti-terrorism war".
					
					The U.S., under the plea of anti-terrorism war, invaded Iraq and Afghanistan allegedly to bring "freedom" and "democracy" to those countries. But what they have done there were massacres of civilians. Many people have been killed in Pakistan, too, by U.S. drone attacks.
					
					The U.S. "anti-terrorism war" has caused a vicious cycle of terrorism and revenge and social disorder in those countries.
					
					The afore-said shooting was an expression of the anti-U.S. sentiments ever growing in these countries.
					
					The "anti-terrorism war" is viewed as a pitfall for the U.S.

articles.title: Flu Prevails in US
articles.content:
Flu Prevails in US
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Influenza has spread all over the United States.
					 Three influenza viruses -- A/H1N1, A/H3N2 and B -- have swept 50 states of the country, increasing casualties.
					
					 About 200,000 are hospitalized for flu in the country every year, 37 000 of them losing their lives.

articles.title: African Pig Pest Sweeps Russia
articles.content:
African Pig Pest Sweeps Russia
 Moscow, February 19 (KCNA) -- African pig pest has raged all over Russia.
					 The epidemic has spread at the speed of 350 kilometers a year, making the situation worse. 
					
					 The spread was reportedly caused by mismanagement of domestic animals in the country.

articles.title: Volcano Erupted Again in Japan
articles.content:
Volcano Erupted Again in Japan
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- A volcano was erupted, accompanied by a quake, in Mt. Shinmoe in southwestern Japan on Friday.
					 The volcano emitted smoke up to 3,000 meters.
					
					 The eruption was followed by series of small ones for two hours.

articles.title: Serious Concern about Dioxin
articles.content:
Serious Concern about Dioxin
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Dioxin has caused a big problem in Europe from the beginning of the year.
					 Dioxin is a poisonous chemical used for herbicide. The carcinogenic substance is not allowed internationally to be used for foodstuff.
					
					 The problem broke out with dioxin-contaminated eggs and chickens found in Germany.
					
					 The Netherlands' import of 130,000 eggs from Germany has given rise to serious public concern.
					
					 The fear of dioxin is spreading over to some Asian countries which imported eggs.
					
					 Necessary measures have been taken in those countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Personages of Ethiopia, Syria and Portugal issued statements to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Nigatu Dagnachew Cherinet, chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, said in his statement on Feb. 10 that the birth of Kim Jong Il was a great historic event which provided the Korean people and the oppressed people of the world with the dawn of the independence era.
					
					 He has led the Korean people in their drive to build a thriving nation with his unique Songun politics, demonstrating the dignity of the DPRK, the statement said.
					
					 Saber Ballul, head of a department of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus in Syria, said in a statement on Feb. 13 that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the DPRK has turned into a powerful country which does whatever it is determined to do.
					
					 Miguel Boieir, chairman of the Portugal-Korea Friendship Association, said in a statement on Feb. 14 that Kim Jong Il has made ceaseless journey of field guidance for building a socialist thriving country in Korea by carrying forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 The lifelong desire of Kim Il Sung, the ideal of Kim Jong Il, is being translated into reality in the DPRK, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised as Great Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised as Great Leader 
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- General Kim Jong Il is the great leader glorifying the DPRK with his Songun politics, stressed the chairman of the Korean Friendship Association (KFA) headquartered in Spain.
					 Chairman Alejandro Cao de Benos said in an interview with KCNA on Friday that Kim Jong Il has performed undying feats for the times and history by pursuing the Songun politics.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 The Songun politics serves as the almighty sword for accomplishing the cause of socialism.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics, the Korean people are steadily working mental and material wealth with strong courage.
					
					 This politics is the most just political mode in the present era.

articles.title: Birthday of Kim Jong Il Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Birthday of Kim Jong Il Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Brazil and Germany issued bulletins to celebrate General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					 The Brazilian Working People's General Centre carried in its Feb. 11 bulletin an article titled "Leader and People-Harmonious Whole", which cited detailed data to show that the Korean people are following leader Kim Jong Il as their father.
					
					 The bulletin noted that he has devoted his all to the people's happiness.
					
					 He and the Korean people are closely united as one in ideology and will, it said, adding: The reality of the DPRK proves that the harmonious whole between the leader and the people serves as the basic guarantee for every miracle and victory in the DPRK.
					
					 The Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany carried its bulletin on Feb. 14 an article titled "Historic Exploits of General Kim Jong Il", which praised his undying feats for the Korean revolution and the world revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Several events took place in India and Denmark on Feb. 8 and 9 in the run-up to the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a meeting, lecture, book and photo exhibitions and film shows.
					
					 Displayed were books and photos introducing the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Songun Korea.
					
					 Films shown included "The Tower of Juche Idea" and "The Country Shining by Arms of Mt. Paektu".
					
					 The director of the Institute for Foreign Policy Studies of India and the chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi in their speeches praised Kim Jong Il for rendering devoted services for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people even on his birthday.
					
					 The chief of the Group for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il in Denmark said that Kim Jong Il has thoroughly embodied the Juche idea, the Songun idea founded by the President, in all fields of politics, economy, military affairs and culture.
					
					 Thanks to his outstanding Songun politics the Korean revolution will advance to victory without the slight deviation despite whatever severe environment and conditions, he added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" was brought out in booklet by the Canta Clara Publishing House in Venezuela on Feb. 10.
					 The work, published on Dec. 25, 1995, clarifies the idea that it is the demand of the revolution to respect the forerunners of the revolution. It also gives exposition of principled matters for establishing the moral trait of respecting the forerunners and developing the relationship of noble moral obligation among the people.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- It happened one day in May 2001 when General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the Naedong Co-op Farm, Kangryong County of South Hwanghae Province which underwent a dramatic change through land realignment.
					 Feasting his eyes on the Naedong plain where standardized vast paddy fields replaced the small patches of rice fields that existed for centuries, he told the officials accompanying him that this reality can be called a tremendous change.
					
					 After a few minutes, he said that it was nice and gratifying to see the realigned fields. He told an official that if he invites artists to visit here and draw paintings on the scenery of the co-op fields alive with rice-transplantation, they would produce very splendid works.
					
					  He, his face beaming with a broad smile, said artists should successfully draw paintings on the socialist co-op fields whose appearance has changed beyond recognition in the era of Songun so that they may be handed down to the generations to come.
					
					 The officials were overcome with deep emotion, looking up to Kim Jong Il making journeys for devoted service for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of its people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il firma la carta de empleados de filial de biotecnologia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il firma la carta de empleados de filial de biotecnologia
  Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il leyo la carta, que le enviaron el 26 de enero los empleados de la filial de biotecnologia de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, y puso la siguiente firma: "El 9 de febrero de 2011. Kim Jong Il".
					  Los remitentes expresaron agradecimiento por el alto reconocimiento y las medidas benevolentes tomadas por el Dirigente para ellos. 
					
					  Manifestaron la decision de marchar mas rapido y saltar mas alto dedicando todos sus esfuerzos espirituales y fisicos al frente de la campana de conquista de las tecnologias de punta para alcanzar la alta meta del pueblo coreano, la cual constituye el deseo del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el ideal del Dirigente.

articles.title: Personalidad japonesa que se dedico a la divulgacion de Kimjongilia
articles.content:
Personalidad japonesa que se dedico a la divulgacion de Kimjongilia
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ATCC) -- "La flor denominada con el nombre del Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Il, quien encauzara el nuevo siglo, florecera en todo el mundo en un futuro cercano".
					Esta frase es de Snao Oohiro, ex miembro representante de la Sociedad de Kimjongilia de Japon.
					
					El fue adepto a la idea Juche y quedo muy impresionado de las nobles virtudes del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en sus reiteradas visitas a Corea.
					
					Explico a los miembros de la sociedad la repercusion mundial que produce la orientacion del Songun del Dirigente y trabajo intensamente para ampliar esa entidad.
					
					Divulgo la Kimjongilia de diferentes maneras como la propaganda y la circulacion de libros referentes a sus caracteristicas biologicas y metodos de cultivo.
					
					En el lecho de su muerte, el pidio que continuaran la divulgacion de Kimjongilia y la publicacion de boletines de la sociedad.
					
					Actualmente, esa flor se reproduce ampliamente en otros paises tambien.
					
					Desde la aparicion de la Asociacion Nordica de Kimjongilias en el 84 (1995) de la Era Juche en Suecia como primera organizacion internacional para la divulgacion de esa flor, quedaron inaugurados los invernaderos de ella en muchos paises como China y Indonesia y fundadas una tras otra las organizaciones de esa mision y ayuda.

articles.title: Festival de Kimjongilias en marcha exitosa
articles.content:
Festival de Kimjongilias en marcha exitosa
 Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ATCC) -- Ahora se realiza exitosamente el 15o Festival de Kimjongilias iniciado el pasado dia 14.
					  Ahora alcanza a mas de 250 mil el numero de visitantes a ese lugar, donde decenas de miles de flores forman un mundo fascinante.
					
					  Fueron exhibidos mas de 200 mil Kimjongilias en este evento que se realiza cada ano en esta capital desde febrero del 86 (1997) de la Era Juche y lo visitaron millones de coreanos y extranjeros. 
					
					  El festival de Kimjongilias es un festival mundial, porque gana atencion de los habitantes surcoreanos, compatriotas en ultramar y otros pueblos de los cinco continentes del planeta.
					
					   Muchas personalidades celebres y entidades de amistad de varios paises y organizaciones internacionales presentan cada ano las Kimjongilias cultivadas por si mismos. Este ano tambien toman parte en el certamen decenas de entidades extranjeras.

articles.title: Transcurre con exito la exhibicion de fotos dedicada al 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Transcurre con exito la exhibicion de fotos dedicada al 16 de febrero
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ATCC) -- Marcha con exito la Exhibicion Central de Fotos, inaugurada el dia 10 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo con motivo del 16 de febrero, dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					En la ocasion estan expuestas centenares de fotos, incluyendo las alusivas a la imborrable historia de guia del Dirigente sobre la revolucion.
					
					Las fotos tituladas "Casa natal en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu, lugar sagrado del sol", "Tribuna de la Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea", "Gran velada de fuegos artificiales por el 65o aniversario de la Fundacion del PTC", etc. demuestran bien la gloria y el jubilo del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos por haber enaltecido al Dirigente en el puesto cimero del partido, el Estado y el ejercito.
					
					Los visitantes se detienen particularmente ante las fotos como "Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Il viendo el entrenamiento de los militares del EPC", "Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Il dirigiendo en el terreno el Criadero de Anguilas Taedonggang subordinado a una unidad del EPC" y "Dirigente  Kim Jong Il en el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek", etc.
					
					Citado por la ATCC al pie de los tableros de fotos, Jo Song Hyok (de 37 anos  de edad), funcionario del Comite Popular del Municipio de Taesong de la ciudad de Pyongyang, dijo que las fotos exhibidas le hacen recordar una vez mas las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente quien lleva a la victoria la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo coreanos avanzaran siempre victoriosos y gloriosos porque son guiados por el Dirigente, gran hombre nacido en el monte Paektu que hace prospera nuestra patria, concluyo.

articles.title: Se dinamizan en Corea preparativos para campeonato de Taekwondo
articles.content:
Se dinamizan en Corea preparativos para campeonato de Taekwondo
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ATCC) -- Para los preparativos del XVII Campeonato Mundial de Taekwondo que tendra lugar en septiembre en esta capital de Corea, patria de este arte marcial, el comite organizador del evento trazo varios planes para el particular y los cumple estrictamente.
					Se acelera en gran escala la construccion del lugar sagrado de Taekwondo que dara a conocer las inmortales direcciones de los hombres sin pares para el desarrollo de Taekwondo, los generos del arte marcial de Corea y el proceso de su desarrollo asi como la trayectoria historica de ITF.
					
					Ademas, se acondiciona magnificamente el Palacio de Taekwondo, sede del presente conclave.
					
					Ya se completaron los disenos del emblema del campeonato, que describe la bandera de la RPDC, el Palacio de Taekwondo y movimientos de este arte marcial, las copas de oro, plata y bronce y el diploma de tecnica que seran otorgados a los jugadores.
					
					Con la meta de salir victoriosos en el presente campeonato, los taekwondoistas coreanos se entregan al entrenamiento.
					
					Pyongyang ya auspicio en el 81 (1992) de la Era Juche el VIII Campeonato Mundial de Taekwondo.
